name: EventRelatedPeriod
title: eventRelatedPeriod
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying a common (periodical) activity of daily living.  Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the RPT segment.

concepts.display: before breakfast (from lat. ante cibus matutinus)
before lunch (from lat. ante cibus diurnus)
before dinner (from lat. ante cibus vespertinus)
after breakfast (from lat. post cibus matutinus)
after lunch (from lat. post cibus diurnus)
after dinner (from lat. post cibus vespertinus)
between dinner and the hour of sleep
